sub_title: Supply Chain Sustainability | Project Management | Stakeholder Engagement | Training Development | Platform Development
summary: I have more than 9 years of experience in project management, technical training packages and IT platform development in supply chain sustainability management. I have worked to encourage positive change in the industry. I enjoy developing training frameworks and utilising my language skills in English, Cantonese and Mandarin. I also have creative skills in translating business needs into technical specifications for software development. Through many of my projects, stakeholder engagement has been critical to success across various mediums, with continuous feedback being worked back into the product.

company.name: ZDHC Foundation - Roadmap to Zero Programme

profile_positions.company: ZDHC Foundation - Roadmap to Zero Programme
profile_positions.description:
𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗖𝗮𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴
• Developed and updated a range of chemical management, wastewater testing and operator in-person multilingual training materials and examinations for the textile, footwear and leather industry.
• Co-developed online training materials that enable the industries to understand a range of ZDHC tools and guidelines.
• Established the accreditation criteria for technical trainers across various sourcing regions.
• With a quality mindset, conducted trainer assessments.
• Improved course materials via pilot trainings and continual feedback from learners and trainers.
 
𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Defined, scoped and designed a range of online platforms to support the business goal in global capacity building and wastewater reporting.
• Translated platform designs into technical requirements in collaborations with IT consultants.
• Projects includes ZDHC Academy, Trainer Online Application System which supported the implementation of training; and  multiple features within ZDHC Gateway to aid common wastewater reporting for the textile industry.
 
𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Authored electronic data reporting guidelines and the accompanying data template to standardise the data that are being uploaded by wastewater testing laboratories.
• Managed and provided domain technical advice to data specialists.
 
𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗵𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Engaged and consulted multi-sectors stakeholders (brands, manufacturers, laboratories, solution providers and consultants) in the development of training and selected numbers of functionalities of online platforms that directly impacted the industry.
• Hosted external in-person consultation workshops with key stakeholders at various events.
profile_positions.title: Programme Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Developed training materials for the Hazardous Substances Control Workshops to improve textile factory chemical management and risk assessment capability.
• Standardised and scaled up workshops across six key textile sourcing countries.
• Analysed participants’ feedback and workshop assessment scores for continual improvement.
 
𝗢𝗻𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗧𝗼𝗼𝗹 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝘂𝗿𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴
• Industrialised and advanced the capability of an online environmental data visualisation and analysis tool by adapting it from the oil industry to suit the needs of the global textile and footwear supply chains. 
• Translated technical requirements into IT specifications. 
 
𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Commercialised, marketed and continually improved key services for the textile and footwear industry to support the textile industry in sustainability changes.
• Recommended service pathways and business models to various supply chains to match their sustainability aspirations.
 
𝗕𝟮𝗕 𝗠𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴
• Crafted marketing materials (including webpages, flyers, press releases and promotional videos) and sales tools.
• Developed and deployed market-specific trainings planned for sale personnel and back-office technical staff across key regions of the business.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Technical Services Manager - Global Softlines

profile_positions.description:
𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺𝗺𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Customised regulatory and certification solutions that enabled brands to access emerging markets such as Indonesia, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia.
• Commercialised key consultancy and certification solutions for the footwear industry.
• Supported technical developments and crafted marketing campaigns for specialised wastewater testing for the textile industry.
 
𝗠𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Carried out market research and analysis for the future development of the global laboratory footprint
 
𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗢𝗿𝗴𝗮𝗻𝗶𝘀𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻
• Organised external and internal workshops and conferences
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Executive - Global Softlines

profile_positions.description:
𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁
• Supported international brands on their technical enquiries and annual quality and compliance programme review.
• Conducted root cause analysis for customers to address product quality issues during production or after product returns 
• Reviewed test reports and validated results from laboratories located in the Asia Pacific Region.

𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗼𝘂𝗻𝘁 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁
• Supported customer account development and maintenance activities to ensure test programme were delivered consistently from a technical point of view
profile_positions.title: Technical Serivce Executive (Textile and Footwear Services)

profile_positions.description:
• Refined and streamlined an experimental process resulting in an increase in efficiency from half a day to 20 minutes.
• Presented experimental research results with a poster at an international scientific conference.
• Used high pressure and low temperature techniques to crystallise liquid samples and studied their crystal structures using x-ray crystallography.
profile_positions.title: Summer Research Assistant (Department of Chemistry)
